array.text: U. Labyrinth is a World Dungeon that consists of 50 floors. Monsters become stronger as you descend further. You can earn more rewards by clearing deeper floors.
U. Labyrinth floors you've cleared are reset every 28 days. After the reset, you'll be able to earn rewards again. Clear the current floor to advance to the next one.
Clear Goblin Base: Zone 7 to enter.
